sub_title: Team Leader / Senior Offshore Engineer at Blue21
summary: Experienced Offshore Engineer with a specialization in design and dynamic analysis of floating structures. Proven expertise in wave-vessel interaction analysis, fluid dynamics, mooring systems, and structural mechanics. Skilled in utilizing hydrodynamic radiation/diffraction models and proficient in programming with Python and Matlab. Demonstrated ability to lead and coordinate teams, manage complex engineering projects, and deliver innovative solutions. Author of 65+ scientific publications. Holds a PhD in Sustainable Energy Systems (2013) from Instituto Superior Técnico (IST), University of Lisbon. Lectured courses on marine renewable energy at IST (2013-2020). Committed to advancing offshore engineering and renewable energy.

education.field_of_study: Sustainable Energy Systems (specialization in Marine Renewable Energy)

authors.headline: Team Leader / Senior Offshore Engineer at Blue21

profile_positions.description:
- Oversee technical feasibility studies and engineering projects for floating structures.
- Leading a team of engineers in conducting engineering studies on floating platforms, interconnections, mooring systems, and breakwaters.
- Development of in-house hydrostatic/hydrodynamic software to support the design of multi-module floating structures.
- Training and supervision to team members and MSc students.
profile_positions.title: Team Leader / Senior Offshore Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Carry out technical feasibility studies for floating structures
- Hydrodynamic analysis of floating structures
- Structural analysis
- Hydroelastic analysis of Very Large Floating Structures
- Development of innovative technology and patenting
- Supervision of MSc students final projects
